content.rendered:
Freeform Progressive Lenses for First Time Users

If you want to make the progression from single vision or bi-focal lenses to progressive lenses, there is no better product than Iris to ease you into it. It’s the ideal entry level product into the world of digital freeform progressive lenses.

Features



  • Progressive lenses made with freeform technology
  • Ideal for first time progressive lens users
  • Smooth progressive view of near, intermediate and far
  • Easy change of focus from far to near
  • Vision clarity & comfort
  • Clearer vision at all distances
  • Easy adaption

Features




Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses

Lens Design
